news_header: US President Joe Biden playfully bit a baby during a Halloween event at the White House.
news_text: During a Halloween celebration at the White House, President Joe Biden, alongside First Lady Jill Biden dressed as a panda, playfully bit a baby while handing out sweets to children. This marks the Bidens' last Halloween at the White House before the upcoming presidential election. Other news includes Kamala Harris's campaign efforts, a train accident in California, a fire in a ballot drop box, and various political events and endorsements.
